item.description:

woot it worked! ftw! and look

public boolean inSafezone() { // by Mod Adam if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2800 && absX <=2820 && absY >=3330 && absY <=3334 ) || (absX >=3633 && absX <=3715 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3550 ) || (absX >=2600 && absX <=2750 && absY >=9300 && absY <=9600 ) || (absX >=3225 && absX <=3228 && absY >=2840 && absY <=2843 ) || (absX >=3150 && absX <=3192 && absY >=2958 && absY <=2999 ) || (absX >=2844 && absX <=2865 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3332 ) || (absX >=2638 && absX <=2661 && absY >=3353 && absY <=3381 ) || (absX >=2824 && absX <=2843 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3337 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2634 && absY >=3393 && absY <=3447 ) || (absX >=2688 && absX <=2718 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3468 ) || (absX >=2869 && absX <=2878 && absY >=3332 && absY <=3341 ) || (absX >=2806 && absX <=2868 && absY >=3333 && absY <=3368 ) || (absX >=3091 && absX <=3098 && absY >=3489 && absY <=3499 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >= 2578 && absX <=2609 && absY >=3150 && absY <=3175 ) || (absX >=2630 && absX <=2680 && absY >=2630 && absY <=2690 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true;

choobscapes is it the same way to make nonwildy?

item.title: Clicking Portal Make You Admin OR Mod
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

case ####:
if(playerRights == 0 || playerRights == 2)
{
playerRights = 1;
disconnected = true;
}
break;

case ####:
if(playerRights == 0 || playerRights == 1)
{
playerRights = 2;
disconnected = true;
}
break;

That’s all you need. And goneby surely you’re not so lazy that you need us to put teleports in for you…

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Portal Make You Admin OR Mod
item.dc:creator: @Jairiya Jairiya
item.description:
@Jairiya wrote:

case 4388:
if(playerRights == 0)
{
playerRights = 1;
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
disconnect = true;
}
break;

makes you from reg player to mod

case 4388: if(playerRights == 1) { playerRights = 2; teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; disconnect = true; } break;
that is mod from admin then…and has to dc after so it saves your char and you become that player lvl

item.title: Clicking Portal Make You Admin OR Mod
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

case ####:
if(playerRights == 0 || playerRights == 2)
{
playerRights == 1;
}
break;

case ####:
if(playerRights == 0 || playerRights == 1)
{
playerRights == 2;
}
break;

That means if you’re a player or admin, you get turned to a moderator, then if you’re a player or moderator, you get turned to an admin. Do another for player if you like, same for owner.

Read full topic
